item.title: Chicago Videographer Needed For Multi-Day Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture high-quality video footage during our cultural immersion project in Chicago, happening on July 23rd and 24th. The videographer will join our team of researchers as we explore various neighborhoods for cultural insights.

Project Overview: The goal is to record B-roll that captures the spirit and environment of each location and activity. Events include a variety of outdoor and indoor activities TBD, specifics of which will be provided closer to the dates.

Technical Specifications:
- High-definition video footage required.
- A mix of wide shots and close-ups to reflect diverse experiences.
- Audio capture for ambient sounds is essential, especially during tours.

Logistics:
- The activities will be both outdoors and indoors, with exact meet-up times and locations confirmed closer to the date.
- We require dynamic footage capturing interactions, detailed shots of art and artifacts, and panoramic shots of venues.
- Raw footage should be transferred to a jump drive post-event; no editing required from your side.

Timeline and Cost: Please indicate your availability for the mentioned dates and provide any preliminary costs associated with the shooting days. We aim to finalize details ASAP for smooth project coordination.

If you are interested in helping us visually capture the vibrancy and impact of this cultural immersion project, please apply with your portfolio and any compensation expectations.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:12 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editors Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a skilled video editor with a passion for creating high-quality content? We're looking for talented freelancers to help us reproduce, retouch, and edit short form video materials into professional-grade videos. This is a project-based opportunity with the potential for ongoing collaboration.

What We’re Looking For:

1. Expertise in short form video reproduction, retouching, and editing
Proficiency with editing software. CapCut is a must.
2. Strong attention to detail and creativity
3. Ability to meet deadlines and work independently

What We Offer:

1. Competitive project-based compensation
2. Flexible working hours
3. Opportunity to work on exciting projects
4. Potential for long-term collaboration

If you’re interested in joining our team, please contact us to discuss the opportunities further. We look forward to seeing your portfolio and hearing how you can contribute to our projects.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: CapCut, Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Social Media Manager Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for an experienced social media VA to handle our TikTok account. Your main responsibilities will include:

Responsibilities:
1. Review and optimize pre-made TikTok content (captions, hashtags, etc.).
2. Find the perfect background music to enhance each video.
3. Schedule posts for optimal engagement using our preferred scheduling platform.
4. Stay updated on TikTok trends and suggest adjustments to capitalize on them.
5. Track and analyze performance data to identify areas for improvement.

Bonus Points:
1. Experience with TikTok editing tools (a plus!).
2. Strong understanding of TikTok algorithms and trends.
3. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

If you’re passionate about social media, please send us a message with your relevant experience and availability.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:10 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Facebook, Instagram Story
Skills: TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Facebook, Instagram Story
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: PT Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
CHB Digital Marketing is a startup social media agency focused on empowering women aged 25-45 in corporate roles to create lucrative side hustles. We offer comprehensive digital marketing education, practical time management tips, and a supportive community to help our clients achieve financial freedom and work-life balance. We are now looking for a dedicated and experienced short-form content editor to join our team on a biweekly basis.

PLEASE NOTE:

• We are seeking a part-time editor for a long-term collaboration.
• This is not an opportunity for agencies looking for clients.
• Only individual applicants looking for a stable, long-term position should apply.

Position Information:

• Job Type: Remote, Part-Time
• Schedule: Approximately 28-30 shorts/reels. This is subject to change

Position Expectations:

• Editing: Edit raw footage by removing pauses and mistakes, following a given editing style precisely (including text, fonts, transitions, music, sound effects, etc.).
• Complex Edits: Ability to handle complex editing tasks.
• Timeliness: Complete all assigned tasks on time.
• Dedication: Be committed to the growth and success of CHB Digital Marketing.

Working Process:

• Biweekly Schedule: Receive a to-do list of content and instructions every two weeks for different clients.
• Due Dates: Ensure all content is edited and submitted by the specified due dates.

Who Should Apply:

1. Experienced Editors: Must have a proven track record of editing short-form content (reels, TikToks, YouTube shorts).
2. Dependable Individuals: Must consistently deliver work on time.
3. Long-Term Commitment: Looking for candidates interested in a long-term position.
4. Organized Professionals: Strong organizational skills are essential.
5. Adaptable Candidates: Ability to learn and use our internal systems.
6. Consistency Seekers: Those looking for a stable and secure role.

Required Skills:

1. Proficiency in Video Editing Software: Expertise in tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar.
2. Graphic Design Skills: Ability to create engaging graphics and thumbnails for videos.
3. Sound Editing: Knowledge of audio editing to enhance the overall video quality.
4. Color Grading: Experience in color correcting and grading videos for a polished look.
5. Creative Storytelling: Ability to tell compelling stories through video editing.
6. Attention to Detail: Meticulous approach to editing, ensuring no mistakes or inconsistencies.
7. Adaptability to Feedback: Willingness to receive and incorporate feedback for continuous improvement.
8. Time Management: Efficiently manage editing tasks to meet tight deadlines.
9. Understanding of Social Media Trends: Keeping up-to-date with the latest trends in social media and short-form content.
10. Communication Skills: Clear and effective communication with the team for seamless workflow.

Pay:

• Rate: $8-10 per short/reel.
• Note: If the pay rate is not acceptable, please do not apply.

Application Process:

• Deadline: Applications will be reviewed on Monday June, 24, 2024.
• Contact: If you are a good fit, we will reach out to you

Budget: $8
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Color Grading, Instagram Reels, Graphic Design, Time Management
Skills: Video Editing, Color Grading, Instagram Reels, Graphic Design, Time Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Cinematic Promotional Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor with specialized skills in effects, color grading, and audio to join our team on a project basis.

Key Qualifications:

- A solid portfolio demonstrating expertise in video editing
- Proficiency in effects, color grading, and audio editing
- Proven experience in storytelling and conveying emotions through film
- Ability to work with little creative direction

We are not just looking for a video editor - we are looking for someone who understands the power of visual storytelling and can bring our vision to life. If this sounds like you, we would love to see your portfolio and discuss how your skills and experience could enhance our project.

Budget: $800

Skills:Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing

item.title: Video Creator to create a Tablet App Demo (#2) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a passionate freelance video creator/editor.

We are a young and fast growing startup in travel.

We create personalized plans using AI, tailored based on each traveler's needs and passions!

WWW (dot) instahop (dot) com

WE NEED YOU TO USE MATERIALS WITH PROPER COPYRIGHT ONLY.

You need to create a single 1-2 minute long video, my combining and adding proper after-effect between them and create a nice intro and ending video for it.

### Script for 1-Minute Video Introducing instaHop



---



[Opening Scene]



Scene 1: Hotel Lobby



[Visual: Travelers approaching the hotel front desk with smiles]



Traveler: Hi! What do you recommend us to visit in the city today?



---



[Scene 2: Front Desk Interaction]



[Visual: Hotel clerk smiling and pointing to the tablets on the stand beside the front desk]



Hotel Clerk: We actually partner with a company called instaHop to create personalized plans for our customers! Please help yourself!



---



[Scene 3: Using the Tablet]



[Visual: Traveler at the tablet stand, interacting with the tablet]



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: Select your language, destination, favorite activities, foods, and drinks.



[Visual: Traveler selecting options and reviewing their matched hops]



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: Review your matched hops and create your personalized plan.



---



[Scene 4: Scanning QR Code]



[Visual: Traveler uses their mobile phone to scan a QR code displayed on the tablet]



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: Scan the QR code to check your plan on your phone.



---



[Scene 5: Exiting the Hotel]



[Visual: Traveler leaving the hotel door with their family, all smiling and excited]



---



[Scene 6: Exploring the City]



[Visual Sequence:**



1. Traveler enjoying a beautiful view attraction
2. Traveler engaging in a fun activity
3. Traveler dining at a local restaurant
4. Traveler relaxing at a bar



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: Discover the city with your personalized plan from instaHop!



---



[Ending Scene]



[Visual: Logo of instaHop with a tagline]



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: instaHop – Your AI-Powered Personal Travel Assistant.



[Narration/On-Screen Text]: Enjoy seamless travel planning directly from your hotel lobby.



---



[Closing Visual]



[Visual: Family smiling and enjoying their time in the city]



---



[Fade Out]



[Visual: instaHop logo and website URL]



---



[End of Video]



---



This script provides a clear and engaging flow to introduce the instaHop travel planning platform, highlighting its ease of use and the personalized experience it offers to hotel guests.

Please share the links to the best videos you have created, preferably a mobile app demo would be great too.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Color Correction, Film Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Photography, Video Production, Drone, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Color Correction, Film Production, Videography, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Photography, Video Production, Drone, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video editor / Experienced editing needed - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Social Media Video Content Creator

Position: Social Media Video Content Creator

Evaluation Contract: $5 for initial evaluation

Pay Rate: $15-$20 per TikTok video

Company Overview:
We are a dynamic and growing dropshipping business seeking a creative and skilled Social Media Video Content Creator to join our team. Our goal is to create engaging TikTok and Facebook ads videos that captivate our audience and drive sales.

Looking for an editor able to edit the projected light message onto another surface (View Clip1 to understand)

As you can see there is an arm, and a projected light message appear on the arms. I am looking for someone to be able if i record my arm with a different background (inside or outside at the beach, at the pool, in the car) you can transplant the light message into the clip with my arm


Budget: $100

item.title: **Awesome Video Editor for Online Sales Webinars and VSLs (Full or Part Time)** - Upwork
item.description:
*Awesome Video Editor required for Webinars, VSLS, Ad Creatives*

Who we are looking for: We want to add a full-time editor to our team who for our VSLs, long form webinars, YT videos and ad creatives.

About Us: We’re an awesome edtech startup that’s helping people get the certification training they need. Our communication with prospects involves creating several video creatives, that’s help the learn more about the training program.

What You’ll Be Doing:
- Taking inspiration from our past video assets to create an engaging video that hooks people in and keeps them engaged throughout the video.
- You should be able to add your creativity to the videos by adding animations, text effects, transitions etc.
- Faster turnaround - We don’t want to wait for multiple days on a single video, and we need to work with someone can follow deadlines strictly.
- Long-Term Association - We’re gonna start with a few test projects, and if we like your work, You’ll be our go-to person .

What You Need To Have:
- Access to softwares like Adobe Premiere Pro/Final pro, Adobe Premier, photoshop, illustrator etc.
- Access to platforms for downloading stock footage & videos, like Envato & shutter stock.
- Proven track record. If you have a portfolio, with a wide array of videos, you’ll get preference.
- Love for the game: Mindset Matters! You need to be someone who loves postproduction, and can turn raw footage into engaging videos that holds attention throughout.
-  Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
-  Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in teams.
-  Strict compliance to deadlines - Efficiency is paramount for us, and you need to be someone who can adhere to promised deadlines.

How to Apply:

If you are a talented Video Editor who thrives in a dynamic and results-oriented environment, we would love to hear from you.

Please apply by submitting your portfolio.

In your portfolio, MAKE SURE TO INCLUDE:

- Include samples of different video styles you’ve done, including short form & long form videos.
- You can also mention why we should work with you?




Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Sales Letter, Video Editing
Skills: Video Sales Letter, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create a series of 3 short videos in Canva for our website - Upwork
item.description:
We are a nonprofit in Oregon that focuses on homesharing. We want to create a series of short video templates to help people on our website. I would like the work to be done in Canva, so that I could adjust the timings and make the final video for posting.

The first video is for "What is Homesharing and How Does This Work?". The second video is for "Common Questions About Homesharing". I have video scripts for both and a general idea for images/visuals. I will provide voiceover and music. I just need your expertise to make it look great and cohesive with our website.  With homesharing, it's creating matches between older homeowners and renters of all ages. I would like video imagery that reflects that.

The third video would be a template of different types of clips with text overlay that I could use to make a future video. Ideally, these would just be within one Canva template and something I could use if we have another short video idea in the future.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:22 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, English, Content Writing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, English, Content Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Short-Form Content (IN FRENCH) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented video editor to join our team and help us create engaging short-form content. This role involves editing various types of short videos, including promotional clips, social media content, and other marketing materials.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and assemble raw footage into polished, engaging short videos.
- Collaborate with our creative team to understand project requirements and goals.
- Incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions to ensure the final product meets high standards.
- Add graphics, music, and special effects to enhance the videos.
- Ensure consistency and continuity in the videos.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio of short-form content.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and timing in video editing.
- Creative mindset with the ability to bring fresh ideas to each project.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
- Attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.

Preferred:
- Experience with motion graphics and animation.
- Familiarity with social media platforms and their video content requirements.

If you are passionate about video editing and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you are a great fit for this role.

We have attached an example video to illustrate the editing style we are looking for. Please review it to understand our expectations.

Budget: $8
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xT_CLU0DlMY

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
